attributes.action: help find the thugs who attacked steven swallow in lincoln
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this petition is to help to find yhe attackers of steven swallow whom was attacked in lincoln on saturday the 28th of june for no reason and if we can find these thugs who did this lincoln would be a much safer place.steven swallow was seriously injured and is now in hospital because of this incident so please sign this petition and help......

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
